note.p: Death: Fife House, Whitehall, London (04 December 1828)
References: J M Edmonds, 'The Founding of the Oxford Readership in Geology, 1818' in NR 1979-80 vol 34 pp 33-51, plate
Sir John Craig, 'The Royal Society and the Royal Mint' in NR 1964 vol 19 pp 156-167

Notes: Elected a Fellow before becoming Baron Hawkesbury and, subsequently (in 1808), 2nd Earl of Liverpool. Not clear in which county Hawkesbury lay: place of that name in Gloucestershire and Warwickshire.
